body_html:
Could you:

  1. Sign the CLA
  2. git pull rebase and push again

Take a look at the recent merge:
#8405

@lukaszkaiser it looks like this implementation might be more compact and easier to maintain? Rather than splitting the class into two, it modifies the current class.

body:
Could you:
1. Sign the CLA
2. git pull rebase and push again

Take a look at the recent merge:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/8405

@lukaszkaiser it looks like this implementation might be more compact and easier to maintain? Rather than splitting the class into two, it modifies the current class.
